legacy.full_text:
🇨🇳China comes alive in celebration of its National Day, which falls on Oct. 1.

▶️'Strive in unity,' Chinese president tells nation on country's 74th National Day

▶️Xi Jinping says future is bright and nation should continue to surmount difficulties and march forward

@MFA_China https://t.co/CNGclO8QZv
